quote.text: Our inability to imagine the length of the rest of existence magnifies our problems.
quote.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana
quote.aiInsight:
Parenthood:
- As a parent, it's easy to get caught up in the day-to-day challenges and struggles. However, taking a step back to consider the bigger picture of existence can help to put things into perspective.
- By understanding that our time as parents is just a small part of the vast expanse of existence, we can better appreciate the fleeting nature of our worries and stressors.

Leadership:
- In leadership roles, it's common to face numerous obstacles and setbacks that can seem overwhelming. Remembering the vastness of existence can help leaders maintain a sense of perspective and stay focused on the bigger picture.
- Leaders who can grasp the concept of the length of existence are better equipped to handle challenges with grace and composure, knowing that these difficulties are just temporary blips in the grand scheme of things.

Product management:
- Product managers often encounter roadblocks and hurdles in their quest to develop successful products. Understanding the length of existence can provide product managers with a sense of patience and perseverance.
- By realizing that product challenges are just small blips in the grand scheme of things, product managers can approach problems with a sense of calm and determination, knowing that these obstacles are only temporary.
